templates.content: We recommend you machine wash with like colors on the delicate cycle in cold water. Don't use bleach or OxyClean, and lay flat to dry. Your pajamas should be treated as delicate and shouldn't be washed with heavy items such as jeans and towels. Washing as directed will extend the life of your garment.
templates.name: Product care recommendations for Lake Pajamas

templates.content: Yes, as with all 100% cotton clothing, you can expect shrinking. Machine drying will increase the degree of shrinking and isn't recommended. Your pajamas should have a relaxed, comfortable fit when new. We typically recommend sizing up if you feel you're between sizes.
templates.name: Will my Pima Pajamas shrink?

templates.content: You can give us a call at (912) 999-6177 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content: Our Pima pajamas are made in Peru.
templates.name: Where are the products made?

templates.content: We offer international shipping to Canada, Australia, Bahamas, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Singapore, Spain, Switzerland, UAE, and UK. International orders are shipped on a delivery duty paid basis therefore international shipping costs, duties, and taxes are calculated at checkout and charged when the order is placed. Shipping costs, duties, and taxes are non-refundable, and we don't provide return labels for international orders at this time. We can't ship gift boxes internationally.
templates.name: International shipping

templates.content: Please follow the instructions during checkout to include a gift message on the packing slip. We don't offer a gift receipt option, but we don't include pricing information in any shipments so the gift recipient won't see those details.
templates.name: Can I add a gift note/message?

templates.content: We don't offer wholesale ordering at this time.
templates.name: Wholesale inquiries

templates.content:
You can still get your gifts by the 24th when you order by:

-Midnight EST of December 18 for Standard Shipping
-Noon EST of December 20 for 2-day shipping
-Noon EST of December 21 for Overnight Shipping

Hope it helps.
templates.name: Holiday Shipping

templates.content: We usually ship via UPS or USPS and once shipped, it will take 1-7 business days domestically. We also offer expedited shipping, if you need it faster.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Thanks for contacting LAKE. I completely understand wanting to take advantage of a great offer, but unfortunately, our sale period has ended. We can't extend discounts outside of the sale timeframe. As a subscriber, you'll be the first to know about future promotions and launches. Let me know if I can assist you with anything else!
